titles.title: Pregnancy Assistance Act of 2019
Pregnancy Assistance Act of 2019
A bill to reauthorize the Pregnancy Assistance Fund.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary: Pregnancy Assistance Act of 2019This bill reauthorizes through FY2024 the Pregnancy Assistance Fund program, which awards grants to states for a range of support services for expectant and parenting teens, women, fathers, and their families. Such services include those related to personal health, child health, parenting, education, and employment.
